This is a sample PDF text content for testing.

It contains multiple paragraphs with different information.

First paragraph discusses the importance of testing in software development.
Proper testing ensures code quality and reduces bugs in production.

Second paragraph covers best practices for unit testing.
Tests should be isolated, repeatable, and fast.

Third paragraph explains integration testing.
Integration tests verify that different components work together correctly.

This document has enough content to create multiple chunks during processing.
Each chunk will be embedded and stored in the vector database for retrieval.

The RAG system will use these chunks to answer user queries about the document.
Semantic search will find the most relevant chunks based on the query.

Final paragraph summarizes the document processing pipeline.
Upload, extract text, chunk, embed, store, and query - these are the key steps.
